featured.text: The week-long rainfall has ______ landslides and flooding in the mountain areas.

definition.zh_def: 洪水，指水位上升到超過正常水平，淹沒土地或建築物的現象。
definition.en_def: The overflow of water onto normally dry land, often caused by heavy rain or melting snow.
definition.example: The flooding after the storm caused significant damage to the homes in the area.
